attributes.action: prosecute and obtain financial compensation from Goodwin et al
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
how can these irresponsible individuals just shrug off these disastrous events  and
not be made to accept responsibility for their actions?
how about for starters extracting compensation off them
that will be hitting them as they have callously hurt others

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
